column1: academy award","lardner shared an academy for best original screenplay with michael kanin in 1942 for woman of the year","lardner shared an award for best original screenplay with michael kanin in 1942 for woman of the year","academy winner whoopi goldberg ( ghost ) stars as a sassy lounge singer forced to hide in a quiet convent .","award winner whoopi goldberg ( ghost ) stars as a sassy lounge singer forced to hide in a quiet convent .","bette davis , ernest hall and victor buono received academy nominations , while norma koch took home an oscar for the costume design .","bette davis , ernest hall and victor buono received award nominations , while norma koch took home an oscar for the costume design .
